name: Dashboard Widget
author: Blase

sections.description:
It is a plugin that adds two sidebar to the dashboard of the admin panel and specjal DW Text Widget. You can place any widget in your dashboard. The whole styling is done in such a way as to keep the appearance of the administration panel in harmony.
You can use it to leave messages or other information to all users or only for specific roles or specific user.

Thanks for downloading my plugin. I hope it will serve you well and meet your expectations.

I wish you successful cooperation.
sections.faq:
Is Dashboard Widget free?

Yes, this is a free plugin.

How is it works?

  1. You are installing the plugin.
  2. Add a widget that interests you.
  3. Ready, the sidebar in the dashboard is visible to a specific group of users.

For which user groups are the available sidebars visible?

Admin Dashboard Info is visible for every user. Admin Dashboard Info for Editora and Author is visible for every user which can edit posts.
You can allso display the selected widget only for a specific user, regardless of the role they have.

Is there a premium version of the plugin?

No, the premium version is unavailable for download from plugin version 1.3.2

Where i can find a support for this plugin?

Fallow link below to check support
https://fiolet.website/dashboard-widget-plugin/
You can allso contact by supprot at wordpres.org

short_description: Very simple plugin to add sidebar with custom widget to your dashboard. You can add a sidebar which is only available to authors.

screenshots.caption: Dashboard with three sidebars - for every users and only for editors and authors.
